headline: Morgan Stanley upgrades Applied Materials on derisked outlook for China
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley upgraded Applied Materials (NASDAQ:AMAT) to Equal-Weight from Underweight, citing a partially derisked outlook for China and its ICAPS business, but warned that weakness in leading-edge logic and DRAM remains a concern heading into fiscal 2026.
